game_description: Facilitate is an easy-to-use creation suite that empowers learning designers and SMEs to rapidly design high impact learning experiences with market-leading flexibility and affordability. Key features include: Micro-simulations, interactive 360 media editor and player, synchronous and asynchronous learning environments, assessments, roleplay functions and LMS integration (SCORM and xAPI). Try our demonstration modules using the following "Guest Access" login codes: Introduction to Facilitate: RMV5SR Training module: syYtPy Education module: gxFndq Email enquiries@unleashed-vr.com to organise your 28-day free trial. For further details about Facilitate's features, subscription pricing, or our partner program, visit https://www.facilitate.tech/platform."
review_1: Good idea for the HSE induction - had a few problems glitching between scenes but may have been my internet connection.
review_2: I like the demo, the graphics of the environment is great. but is it possible to create a full version account to relax and enjoy the environments without paying or being a trainee. too expensive!
